pages.title: The Steam Quarry
pages.text: The Steam Quarry is a steam multiblock machine that consumes bronze drills, uses them to dig deeper than the bedrock and gives you back some ores, as you can see in REI.$(br2)It's recommended that you have multiple SBFs running before you attempt to build it because it requires $(l)a lot of steel$().

If this is the first multiblock you are building, make sure to read $(l:modern_industrialization:steam_age/coke_oven)the Coke Oven entry$()! It explains how multiblocks work, how to check if the structure is correct, and how to use hatches.
